P0=ISend(0,123,-204059360);Recv(0,123);ISend(0,123,-203731648);Recv(0,123);ISend(1,123,-203575424);Recv(1,123);ISend(1,123,-203104384);Recv(*,*);Wait(-204059360);Wait(-203731648);Wait(-203575424);Recv(1,567);ISend(1,234,-202332736);Recv(1,123);Recv(1,123);Barrier;
P1=ISend(1,123,-204024000);Recv(1,123);ISend(1,123,-203877760);Recv(1,123);ISend(0,123,-203419328);Recv(0,123);ISend(0,123,-203053504);Recv(*,*);Wait(-204024000);Wait(-203877760);Wait(-203419328);ISend(0,567,-202476032);Recv(*,234);ISend(0,123,-202177408);ISend(0,123,-202171456);Barrier;
